title: Development Control Regulations, if any, can be availed either by full or part utilization of TDR or full or part utilization of TDR if permissible in this regulation or full or part utilization of additional FSI at the option of owner
clause_text: Development Control Regulations, if any, can be availed either by full or part utilization of TDR or full or part utilization of TDR if permissible in this regulation or full or part utilization of additional FSI at the option of owner. However, the restriction of road width mentioned as per these regulations e shall not be applicable when the owner exercises his option of availing utilization of additional FSI and in such cases limitation of maximum building potential as mentioned in regulation no 5.4.1 shall not be applicable.
section: .1 Utilization of Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) and Road Width Relation will be govern by regulation 30 (A) subject to following notes:-
